# Sprint 1 Frontend – Bhumi

Listing feed, detail page, create listing form, image upload, search/filter, and report flow.

## Close issues when this PR is merged

Replace the placeholders below with your actual GitHub issue numbers (e.g. if FE-8 is issue #5, write `Closes #5`).

```
Closes #<FE-8>
Closes #<FE-9>
Closes #<FE-10>
Closes #<FE-11>
Closes #<FE-12>
Closes #<FE-13>
Closes #<FE-14>
Closes #<FE-15>
```

**How to find issue numbers:** Repo → Issues tab → each issue shows its number in the title (e.g. `#12`).
